unnormalised: Fasal bima, che? Dorkar gea, menkhan dukh gea, inj mena!
normalised: Fasal bima, seteng? Darkar do darkar ge, menkhan ragiya jinish kan men dakhi!

unnormalised: Añjom akadań je, parom disom japiť re Maharashtra re do chasij ko hasoṛok kana.
normalised: Ajom akada je geçêñ moncun hilok do Maharashtra ren kulhi kô do bhari kasthô kân tahêñ.

unnormalised: Injren mama, Kerala ren Krishnan, do meneda je adi dorkar gea, jiyon dobachao gea, khas kore Onam okhoy re bujhaw baṅ ñamok japiť daka re do.
normalised: Inañ mama, Kerala ren Krishnan, menay da je nôy do jiwi bachao jinish kan, khas kâr kâr Onam porob ôktô re jakhon barsa rida do thik bang tahen.

unnormalised: Menkhan, sarkari kamo do duk kargea, che?
normalised: Menkhan, sorkari kân kan bhari kasthô kan, seteng?

unnormalised: Joto nuskañ hoe akaw do pore, 5000 taka bima paisa ñamok do adi kaṭhin gea!
normalised: Hêteñ nuksan hôyok khon hôñ poñchô hajar taka em ôdoy do mêda chôñ akâd lekage!

unnormalised: Aasa do hoe kana je, paristhiti do sudharok kana, ho sakaw PM Fasal Bima Yojana do sachi ge madat emok kana.
normalised: Asha kânâñ je jinish kô do sudhor kân, hôyo dareya je P M Fasal Bima Yojana do asol re upkâr kân.
Safa sâfi katha do darkar, re!

unnormalised: Inj do biryani ar miť bhalo niti ko do duhrao inj mone do khojok kana.
normalised: Nôy katha do inak biryani jôm sanay ñâña aru miñ chânga policy dohor rûwar sanay ñâña.
